title: pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working
body:
after installing the game it give the the error pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working
. if anyone could help me it be appreciated !
thanks

replies.body: This kernel error can happen if your PC is blocking the patcher from opening.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should restore access.  Let me know if you have any questions.
